Terlalu Berisik Saat Bercinta, Turis Ditendang dari Kapal Pesiar
04 Nov 2019, 22:10 by Wahyu Setyo Widodo


Ilustrasi bercinta (iStock)

Barbados - Pasangan turis dari Jerman ini ditendang keluar dari kapal pesiar yang mereka naiki. Penyebabnya, mereka terlalu berisik saat sedang bercinta. Waduh!Pasangan turis asal Jerman bernama Volker, dan istrinya Renate F, diusir dari atas kapal pesiar yang mereka naiki. Mereka dianggap terlalu berisik saat sedang bercinta dan mengganggu penumpang lainnya.Dikumpulkan dari beberapa sumber, Senin (4/11/2019), Volker dan istrinya diminta turun dari kapal pesiar di hari pertama mereka liburan. Padahal masih ada sekitar 2 minggu lagi perjalanan ke Karibia naik kapal pesiar Tui Cruises.Volker dan Renate mengaku saat itu memang mereka lupa untuk mengunci pintu balkon. Mereka juga mengaku mereka bersuara sedikit keras saat sedang bercinta.Tapi penumpang lain menyebut setelah bercinta, pasangan ini sempat ribut dan berantem. Meski tidak ditemukan tanda-tanda kerusakan di kamar mereka.Oleh hotel manajer dan pihak sekuriti, akhirnya Volker dan istrinya diturunkan dari kapal pesiar. Mereka terlantar di Barbados dan terpaksa mengeluarkan uang ribuan dollar untuk penerbangan pulang ke Jerman.Volker dan istrinya pun tidak terima dan berencana mengajukan gugatan ke pihak kapal pesiar. Renate mengklaim mereka ditelantarkan dan diabaikan. Mereka pun menuntut kompensasi dan reimburse biaya tiket pesawat yang sudah dikeluarkan akibat peristiwa ini.Pihak Tui Cruises membenarkan adanya insiden tersebut. Mereka beralasan bahwa keputusan itu dilakukan untuk menjaga keamanan. Selebihnya mereka menolak untuk berkomentar.Simak Video "Kapal Pesiar Greenpeace di Jakarta"[Gambas:Video 20detik](wsw/krs)

Too noisy when making love, tourists kicked from cruise ships
04 Nov 2019, 22:10 by Wahyu Setyo Widodo


Illustration of lovemaking (iStock)

Barbados - This tourist couple from Germany was kicked out of the cruise ship they were riding on. The reason, they are too noisy when making love. Wow, a German tourist couple named Volker, and his wife Renate F, were kicked out of the cruise ship they were riding on. They were considered too noisy when making love and disturbing other passengers. Collected from several sources on Monday (11/04/2019), Volker and his wife were asked to get off the cruise ship on their first day of vacation. Though there are still about 2 more weeks to travel to the Caribbean aboard the cruise ship Tui Cruises. Volker and Renate admitted at that time indeed they forgot to lock the balcony door. They also claimed they sounded a little loud while making love. But other passengers said after making love, the couple had a noisy and fighting. Although no signs of damage were found in their room. By the hotel manager and security, Volker and his wife were finally unloaded from the cruise ship. They were stranded in Barbados and forced to spend thousands of dollars for flights back to Germany. Volker and his wife were not accepted and planned to file a lawsuit with the cruise ship. Renate claimed they were abandoned and ignored. They also demanded compensation and reimbursement of plane ticket costs that have been incurred due to this incident. Tui Cruises confirmed the existence of the incident. They reasoned that the decision was made to maintain security. The rest of them refused to comment. Watch Video "Greenpeace Cruise in Jakarta" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (wsw / krs)
